events.name: Dallas Stars at Tampa Bay Lightning

headlines.description: — Andrei Vasilevskiy stopped 25 shots for his first shutout of the season, NHL points leader Nikita Kucherov had a goal and an assist, and the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Dallas Stars 4-0 Monday night to snap a four-game skid.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vasilevskiy, Kucherov help Lightning end 4-game skid in 4-0 win over Stars

video.headline: Anthony Cirelli nets goal vs. Stars

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Anthony Cirelli nets goal vs. Stars) 2023/12/05 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Sean Couturier scored 3:55 into overtime to lead the Philadelphia Flyers to a 2-1 victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sean Couturier's OT goal lifts Flyers over Penguins 2-1

video.headline: Sean Couturier wins it in OT for Flyers

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Sean Couturier wins it in OT for Flyers) 2023/12/05 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Sean Monahan scored twice and Josh Anderson broke a 27-game goal drought dating to last season with an empty-netter that sealed the Montreal Canadiens' 4-2 win over the Seattle Kraken on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sean Monahan scores twice and Montreal holds off Seattle, 4-2

video.headline: Tanner Pearson tallies goal vs. Kraken

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Tanner Pearson tallies goal vs. Kraken) 2023/12/05 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Nikolaj Ehlers and Kyle Connor each had a goal and added an assist to lead the Winnipeg Jets to a 2-1 victory over the Carolina Hurricanes on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ehlers, Connor lead Jets to 2-1 win over Hurricanes

video.headline: Nikolaj Ehlers scores goal vs. Hurricanes

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Nikolaj Ehlers scores goal vs. Hurricanes) 2023/12/05 ESHEET

headlines.description: — A quirk in the schedule forced Arizona to play six straight games against the last five Stanley Cup champions.
headlines.shortLinkText: Coyotes beat Capitals 6-0 for historic fifth straight win against previous Stanley Cup champions

video.headline: Logan Cooley tallies goal for Arizona Coyotes on the power play

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Logan Cooley tallies goal for Arizona Coyotes on the power play) 2023/12/05 ESHEET

events.name: St. Louis Blues at Vegas Golden Knights
